thread.title: HSSC Recruitment 2017 hssc.gov.in 7991 Constable/Officer/Clerk & Other

author: admin
title: HSSC Recruitment 2017 hssc.gov.in 7991 Constable/Officer/Clerk & Other
text: Grab Today: Latest SSC Jobs Notification Hiring Process : Selection of the candidates will be done on the basis of their performance in the stages of test such as: 1) Physical Screening Test (PST) 2) Knowledge Test (KT) 3) Physical Measurement Test (PMT) 4) Interview-cum-Personality Test No TA/DA will be admissible for any candidate, so all the candidates will have to appear for selection at their own expense. Read These Articles: Simple Tips For Dressing When Job-Hunting How to apply for HSSC Recruitment ? Kindly, all the candidates are requested to visit to the official web portal of the Haryana Staff Selection Commission that is “www.hssc.gov.in”. After that, go to the “Advertisement” tab mentioned in the menu bar of the homepage and open it. Now press on the advertisement number link that is “1/2017” and open the PDF. Here are the notification details, read it carefully. Then Fill Online Application Form correctly including every detail in prescribed manner. Upload the scanned copies of required testimonials and certificates along with the application form. At last, submit the application form and take a print out for further usage. Important Date : Last date of Applying: 28.02.2017 Note : Candidates are required to check Official Notification which is given above to obtain complete details related to HSSC Recruitment 2017. You can also bookmark this page by pressing CTRL + D. Check More Job Options from Below:
